comment._content: Five cents for a Pepsi...in a glass bottle no doubt!

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called New Mexico Photos by New Mexico Photographers., and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 78912708@N07
comment._content:
I remember Pepsi's jingle from the 40s: "Pepsi Cola hits the spot, twelve full ounces that's a lot, twice as much for a nickel, too. Pepsi Cola is the drink for you!" 

I also liked its taste better than that of Coke.
